Name: Your little story: Winter
About the game: You were preparing for the New Year celebration, decorating the Christmas tree. But with your bad luck, you've slipped and fallen unconscious... When you came back to yourself, you found an incredibly beautiful person next to yourself. They claimed to be the spirit who came to your aid because all the toys for the Christmas tree were broken and there were only a few hours left before the New Year! Believe it or not? Smile or get angry? Agree or refuse? The choice is yours! Choice of romantic interest: a cute and cheerful girl or a cold and detached guy 10 colorful CG(5 for boy and girl), beautiful backgrounds Easy story that brightens up your evening ~30 min
